name: docpad-plugin-php
description: Adds support for the PHP language to DocPad.
readme:
# PHP Plugin for DocPad Adds support to [DocPad](https://github.com/bevry/docpad) for writing your templates using [PHP](http://www.php.net/manual/en/language.basic-syntax.phpmode.php) Convention: `.anything.php|phtml` ## Install ``` npm install --save docpad-plugin-php ``` ## History You can discover the history inside the `History.md` file ## License Licensed under the incredibly [permissive](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Permissive_free_software_licence) [MIT License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/MIT/)
Copyright © 2012 [Bevry Pty Ltd](http://bevry.me)
Copyright © 2011 [Benjamin Lupton](http://balupton.com)
